name: Igglybuff
description: The Balloon Pokémon. Left to its own devices, it will constantly practice singing. You should make it take a break so it doesn’t hurt its throat.

abilities.name: Cute Charm
abilities.description: Once per short rest, you can impose disadvantage on an enemy attack roll of your choice.

abilities.name: Competitive
abilities.description: This Pokémon adds its proficiency bonus to damage rolls while poisoned, burned, confused, or paralyzed.

abilities.name: Friend Guard
abilities.description: Once per long rest, when an ally within 15 feet of this Pokémon is hit by an attack, it may choose to halve the damage dealt.
